component.name: aws2-kinesis-firehose
component.title: AWS 2 Kinesis Firehose
component.description: The aws2-kinesis-firehose component is used for producing Amazon's Kinesis Firehose streams.
component.label: cloud,messaging

amazonKinesisFirehoseClient.description: Amazon Kinesis Firehose client to use for all requests for this endpoint

lazyStartProducer.label: producer
lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

proxyHost.description: To define a proxy host when instantiating the Kinesis Firehose client

proxyPort.description: To define a proxy port when instantiating the Kinesis Firehose client

proxyProtocol.description: To define a proxy protocol when instantiating the Kinesis Firehose client

region.description: The region in which Kinesis Firehose client needs to work. When using this parameter, the configuration will expect the lowercase name of the region (for example ap-east-1) You'll need to use the name Region.EU_WEST_1.id()

basicPropertyBinding.label: advanced
basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

amazonKinesisFirehoseClient.description: Amazon Kinesis Firehose client to use for all requests for this endpoint

By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. basicPropertyBinding.label: advanced
basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

synchronous.label: advanced
synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).
